storyInfo:
The Paleroches slightly change their attitude toward the Doctor, in the light of said party's conduct.
Meanwhile, Gnosis gets in touch with Ratatos, and conveys a need to show her some things.

attributes.content: Hey, did you hear? Supposedly that guest of honor we were keeping an eye on, the Doctor or whatever, was attacked by Silverash's people?
attributes.name: Sluggish Soldier

attributes.content: You only just heard about it? The news is everywhere.
attributes.name: Nosy Soldier

attributes.content: Then why don't you tell me what the hell is going on? Wasn't this Doctor person invited by Enciodes himself?
attributes.name: Sluggish Soldier

attributes.content: Well, the version of the story I heard is, the attackers apparently thought that after the Doctor went over, Arctosz offered some under-the-table deals.
attributes.name: Nosy Soldier

attributes.content: Huh? Master Arctosz wouldn't do something like that!
attributes.name: Sluggish Soldier

attributes.content: Dumbass, can't you tell this is obviously nonsense made up by the attackers?
attributes.name: Nosy Soldier

attributes.content: If you ask me, after finding out that Arctosz is going to be hosting the Doctor, Enciodes is trying to set Arctosz up.
attributes.name: Nosy Soldier

attributes.content: Maybe the people behind the attack were sent by Enciodes too.
attributes.name: Nosy Soldier

attributes.content: Yeah, that makes sense, just as you said.
attributes.name: Sluggish Soldier

attributes.content: Then why are we spending all this time keeping tabs on this Doctor? They're probably not in cahoots with Enciodes.
attributes.name: Sluggish Soldier

attributes.content: I didn't fully understand you before, so I ask your forgiveness if I have offended you in any way.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: As you are Enciodes's honored guest, I should be watching my words...
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: But, something doesn't add up about this attack made against you.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.options: Someone's pulling the strings.;I can't determine what the purpose would be.;Their actions aren't exactly reasonable.

attributes.content: Enciodes...
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.options: No, he doesn't stand to gain anything from this.
(I have my own ideas about who's behind it, but...)

attributes.content: I could've sworn they were trying to harm you to give Enciodes an excuse to seek retribution against the Paleroche clan, accusing them of failing to protect you.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.options: A crime is a far graver offense than dereliction of duty.

attributes.content: That's what I think too. They clearly already received the information that Weiss passed along on behalf of Enciodes, yet still are distrustful of you.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: It's almost as if...
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.options: And used the premise we just discussed to incite them.

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: Hah, well said.
Valais, we always said you were a skilled tactician and had a good head on your shoulders. But looks like you still have a lot to learn from the Doctor.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: You're exactly right, Sir.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: Oh, right, Valais. Pass this message on for me – My men don't need to keep watch over the Doctor anymore. Just focus on guarding our territory.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: As for the guards the Doctor brought along, they will be allowed to come and go freely from now on.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Yessir.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: I just happened to overhear a bit of your conversation from the hallway.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I don't have any interest in your guessing games, but I might be able to offer you some clues.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Kjeragandr is our witness. Doctor, I apologize for the rudeness of the Paleroche clan––
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: On my name as head of the house of Paleroche, I swear to Kjeragandr that I was not the one who instigated this attack.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: If you are willing to believe me, let me assure you that there are absolutely no scoundrels in the Paleroche clan that would carry out such a malicious attack behind my back.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.options: Thank you for your trust, Arctosz.;Thanks for the tip, Arctosz.

attributes.content: Hm? I never said anything about trusting you, Doctor.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: But at least I am certain now that you aren't up to any mischief.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Hahaha! Good.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Doctor, I may not be much of a philosopher, but even a rough-around-the-edges man like me can smell that there's something unusual brewing in Kjerag.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: That damned Enciodes, suddenly talking about ceding power back to the Saintess, then driving Gnosis away, and now putting you in this position...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: And someone attacked you in the midst of it all.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Let me be honest – I can't help but to suspect that Enciodes is up to no good, even if he hasn't shown the slightest flaw in what he's doing.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: But I'm not going to sit around and wait for the land granted to us by Kjeragandr to fall into danger...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.options: Us making amends could also mean...;If our enemy is able to predict your response...
Then they no longer need to use me as a smokescreen.;They've finished their preparations, and there's not much time left.

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Boom–– A massive explosion goes off in the distance.
The people outside whisper amongst each other, debating whether or not it is going to snow.
The people inside lower their heads without a word, shouldering an intangible burden.
Gnosis Edelweiss.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Madame Ratatos Browntail.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: It seems like I've finally earned the privilege of talking with you face-to-face?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: You can't fool me with that feigned humility, Gnosis.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: You are plenty smart yourself. Let there be no shady dealings between honest people.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: If you didn't want something from me, you would not have been trying to meet me again and again.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Heh. If you're just trying to assert your dominance here, then I do believe it is time for me to bid thee farewell.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Don't be in such a hurry, Gnosis. I have a few questions for you.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: When I first heard that the Edelweiss clan followed Enciodes back to Kjerag, I frankly was not too surprised.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: I thought you either had some evidence to prove that the Edelweisses would not be adverse to the Silverash clan, or perhaps, you had something to hold over Enciodes.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: But neither you nor Enciodes have said anything about what happened back then, while you still allow the Silverashes to rebuke you for your shamelessness.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: What keeps you going? I'm curious.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: ...He promised me a future.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: A future?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Kjerag's future. An emerging industrial country that would allow me to utilize my talent in research without fear of plagiarism, misuse, or suppression.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: That's all?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Needless to say, I never expected you to understand in the first place, Ratatos. You will never be a researcher after all.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: It may be difficult for you to understand how thrilling it is to freely explore the innovation and application of technology, backed by plenty of resources and privilege. To be given a legitimate purpose.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: So that's the deal you struck. You give him your skills, and he provides you a stage.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: And then what?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Surely you aren't going to tell me that he pushed you out and made you take the fall just to protect himself.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Is this all that Karlan Trade's cost-benefit analysis amounts to?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: You seem to have a lot of faith in Karlan Trade. Why didn't you accept the offer to work under Enciodes two years ago?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Don't be ridiculous. No matter how powerful Enciodes is, he cannot change the faith that has been deeply rooted in the bones of our people for thousands of years.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Karlan Trade can only grow as big as the Tri-Clan Council and the Vine-Bead Court allow, and it is impossible for Kjerag to industrialize––
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: —Wait.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: So he's found a new bargaining chip?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Exactly.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: There was no way for Enciodes to turn the people of Kjerag against Kjeragandr, so he had to reach a compromise.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: But he's been stuck there for far too long. No matter how many times I tried to push him, he seems indifferent.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Until there finally came an opportunity to turn things around.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Ensia's Oripathy symptoms are under control, and though there still isn't a cure, she was able to return to him alive and well...
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: ...and excitedly told him that it might be possible to deepen cooperation with an outside party to better control the spread and harm of Oripathy at a lower cost.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: No, Enciodes wouldn't...
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Of course not. Once the gate to Kjerag is opened, it cannot be completely sealed again.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: The number of Infected living in Kjerag will only increase– this is the reality of our world. During the process of Kjerag's continued development, the ability to deal with Oripathy will ultimately become a new bargaining chip.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: He is about to make the people of Kjerag decide between faith and technology, and faith alone will no longer protect them from Oripathy.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Empty rhetoric. There's no proof.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Come with me then. Bring your people along, including those who can fight, and I will show you something.
attributes.name: Gnosis
